channel.title: Need help!
channel.description:
ok ive got a few private server based questions for anyone who knows the answers too them
q1 : ive downloaded a deltascape source, ive got it too compile and it runs, do i need too add my no-ip adress anywhere into the java files ? ive got the port 43594 in server.ini i think.
after the answer too that question, depending on what it is, ill probably have a few more.
thanks alot.

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @oldschoolscape oldschoolscape
item.description:
@oldschoolscape wrote:

im confused on how no-ip and the server communicate with each other, surely i have too put the no-ip adress into my server files somehwere? please answer this question.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @Dart_Zamaki Dart Zamaki
item.description:
@Dart_Zamaki wrote:

Yes. There are ways without having to port forward.
Just expierment with what is done of whats shown.

Just put your internet ip as the “server ip” it asks for.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @oldschoolscape oldschoolscape
item.description:
@oldschoolscape wrote:

[quote=“Dart Zamaki, post:2, topic:261757”]Well, here is a basic way to try out. This way you can test in a more simple way

Don’t try to make it any harder than it needs to be.
Which it really isn’t that hard once you see how its done but still.

[color=red]→→→→→→→→→→[b]Click here to fix the issues←←←←←←←←←←←[/quote]

you have confused me, lol - so I should be able too sign into the server even though its not being portforwaded?

Also thanks for pointing me too that guide but do i need to put my no-ip adress into any java file on my server, like you have to with the port you use.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @Dart_Zamaki Dart Zamaki
item.description:
@Dart_Zamaki wrote:

Well, here is a basic way to try out. This way you can test in a more simple way

Don’t try to make it any harder than it needs to be.
Which it really isn’t that hard once you see how its done but still.

[color=red]→→→→→→→→→→[b]Click here to fix the issues←←←←←←←←←←←

Read full topic
